short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Does the Dog Die API integration with Netflix

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When users click on a Netflix title, this extension will add additional information to the movie description. E.g. instead of listing "violence, drugs, sex" this extension adds additional content warnings like "loud noises, bones breaking, animal cruelty" retrieved from www.doesthedogdie.com.

In the first screenshot, the paragraph of text prefaced with "DTDD: ..." is the additional content warning.

Update 0.2: In the second screenshot, users can interact with the extension to search for titles, selecting the appropriate title from the dropdown.

This extension prevents the necessity to leave the Netflix site and manually lookup content warnings.
